thread.title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 692,936 mld, prestiti marginali 237 mln Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 692,936 mld, prestiti marginali 237 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 22 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 237 434 Use of overnight deposit facility 692,936 690,442 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
